パッケージ org.sxb.core.task

任务调度用

参照先: 説明

  • インタフェースの概要 
    インタフェース 説明
    AsyncListenableTaskExecutor
    Extension of the AsyncTaskExecutor interface, adding the capability to submit tasks for ListenableFutures.
    AsyncTaskExecutor
    Extended interface for asynchronous TaskExecutor implementations, offering an overloaded AsyncTaskExecutor.execute(Runnable, long) variant with a start timeout parameter as well support for Callable.
    SchedulingTaskExecutor
    A org.sxb.task.TaskExecutor extension exposing scheduling characteristics that are relevant to potential task submitters.
    TaskExecutor
    Simple task executor interface that abstracts the execution of a Runnable.
  • クラスの概要 
    クラス 説明
    CustomizableThreadCreator
    线程安全用自定制线程生成器
    Simple customizable helper class for creating new Thread instances.
    CustomizableThreadFactory
    Implementation of the ThreadFactory interface, allowing for customizing the created threads (name, priority, etc).
    ExecutorConfigurationSupport
    Base class for classes that are setting up a java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService (typically a ThreadPoolExecutor).
    SimpleAsyncTaskExecutor
    TaskExecutor implementation that fires up a new Thread for each task, executing it asynchronously.
    SyncTaskExecutor
    TaskExecutor implementation that executes each task synchronously in the calling thread.
    TaskExecutorAdapter
    Adapter that takes a JDK java.util.concurrent.Executor and exposes a Spring org.sxb.task.TaskExecutor for it.
    ThreadPoolTaskExecutor
    JavaBean that allows for configuring a ThreadPoolExecutor in bean style (through its "corePoolSize", "maxPoolSize", "keepAliveSeconds", "queueCapacity" properties) and exposing it as a Spring TaskExecutor.
  • 例外の概要 
    例外 説明
    TaskRejectedException
    Exception thrown when a TaskExecutor rejects to accept a given task for execution.
    TaskTimeoutException
    Exception thrown when a AsyncTaskExecutor rejects to accept a given task for execution because of the specified timeout.

パッケージorg.sxb.core.taskの説明
